name: Ancient Den

flavor_text: Taj-Nar, throne of Raksha Golden Cub, destined leader of the leonin prides.

name: Arcane Signet
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

name: Bojuka Bog
oracle_text:
Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Boros Locket
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}, {T}, Sacrifice Boros Locket: Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"We pass these along to our fellow soldiers to recognize deeds of valor. It won't stay with you for long."
—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

name: Brainstorm
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor_text: The mizzium-sphere array drove her mind deep into the thought field, where only the rarest motes of genius may be plucked.

name: Coiling Oracle
oracle_text: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.
flavor_text: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.

name: Commander's Sphere
oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.
flavor_text: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.

name: Command Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text:
"Approach my tower on bended knee or depart from it as ash upon the wind."
—Gadwick, the Wizened

flavor_text:

name: Epicure of Blood
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text: "Fleshy, with just a hint of leather. A fine vintage."

name: Faithless Looting
oracle_text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Feed the Swarm
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.

—Skyclave inscription

name: Great Furnace
oracle_text: {T}: Add {R}.

flavor_text:

flavor_text: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

"The land grows only where the kami will it."
—Dosan the Falling Leaf

name: Mana Geyser
oracle_text: Add {R} for each tapped land your opponents control.
flavor_text: The Quicksilver Sea hissed and bubbled at the indignity. The Vulshok shaman just smiled.

name: Mycosynth Wellspring
oracle_text: When Mycosynth Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The oil created the mycosynth. The mycosynth created New Phyrexia.

name: Opal Palace
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. If you spend this mana to cast your commander, it enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of times it's been cast from the command zone this game.

name: Pilgrim's Eye
oracle_text:
Flying
When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The kor send their thopter kites to see if the land is in a welcoming mood.

name: Ponder
oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle.

Flying

name: Seething Song
oracle_text: Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.
flavor_text: Vulshok mana rituals echo the day when the red sun burst through Mirrodin's surface to take its place in the heavens.

name: Simic Signet
flavor_text: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.
